extensionDescription.message: Add a button to arXiv pages to send PDF links to ChatGPT/Gemini/Kimi/Doubao for analysis

fallbackTitle.description: Default text when paper title cannot be extracted

confirmRestore.message: Are you sure you want to restore default prompt?

defaultPrompt.message:
Hello! Please help me deeply analyze the paper titled "$${title}".
Please focus on:
1. What problem does this paper solve?
2. What are the core innovations and methodologies?
3. What do the experimental results show?
Paper PDF URL: $${url}
